name: Survive Outdoors Longer Emergency XL Bivvy Sack
description: Sized for 2 people, this emergency bivy sack allows you to efficiently conserve body heat and stay dry. The metalized fabric reflects up to 90% of your radiated body heat. It's waterproof, windproof, and extremely light. Comes with its own extra-large stuff sack, which will also accommodate extra survival gear.Made of vacuum-metalized polyethylene.Stuff sack is made of silnylon.Dimensions are 213cm x 152cm
